str2: By no means, not at all. Adverb from a compound of me and amos; by no means.
Lord, master, sir; the Lord. From kuros; supreme in authority, i.e. controller; by implication, Master.
Peter, a Greek name meaning rock. Apparently a primary word; a rock; as a name, Petrus, an apostle.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: Answer, bid, bring word, command. A primary verb; to speak or say.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Active - 1st Person Singular

str2: All, the whole, every kind of. Including all the forms of declension; apparently a primary word; all, any, every, the whole.
Probably from sun; common, i.e. shared by all or several, or profane.
